SectionBody.Text: Any person, firm, corporation, or association engaged in receiving, packing, handling, or selling poultry in permanent boxes may, in order to designate the ownership of such boxes or distinguish such boxes from other similar boxes, adopt, own, and use any name or mark and permanently affix or stamp such name or mark on any poultry box, except cardboard, fiberboard, or wood containers, which poultry box is owned by such person, firm, corporation, or association.
